text: Munich is a 2005 American-French-Canadian historical drama movie. It was nominated for 5 Academy Awards in 2006. It is about the assassinations of Palestinian terrorists by Mossad agents following the Munich massacre of the Israeli Olympic athletes. ==References== Category:2000s epic movies Category:2000s historical movies Category:2005 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Steven Spielberg Category:Movies composed by John Williams Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about assassinations Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in Athens Category:Movies set in Cyprus Category:Movies set in Malta Category:Movies set in Israel Category:Movies set in Lebanon Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Munich Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Rome Category:Movies set in the Netherlands Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies
title: Munich (movie)
